name: Coffeemesh
tag_list: interest, interest-chat-network, chat, live-chatting, coffee-break, learn, discuss, qa, teach, talk, serious, social-network
overview:
Coffeemesh is the first Interest-Chat Network in the World to discover new points of view, deepen your interests and enrich your knowledge.

It comes from the idea of live chatting and it offers the opportunity to discuss with the people who share the same interests instantaneously. Coffeemesh allows to communicate with other users, discuss, share thoughts and opinions and receive immediate answers on users’ favorite topics.

Coffeemesh is the online place for sharing, discussing and exchanging ideas on any topic. Whether it is economics, cinema or biology, people will be able to learn, ask, share opinions and create new ideas with the users who share the same interests, thus forming a serious community to rely on.

Users will be able to teach, learn or just share a thought thanks to the live chats, that will allow them to get in touch with all the other users who share the same interests.
